argumentText:
ARGUMENT
l

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | islat.b | |- B = ( Base ` K ) |
| 2 |  | islat.j | |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) |
| 3 |  | islat.m | |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) |
| 4 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( l = K -> ( join ` l ) = ( join ` K ) ) |
| 5 | 4, 2 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( l = K -> ( join ` l ) = .\/ ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( l = K -> dom ( join ` l ) = dom .\/ ) |
| 7 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( l = K -> ( Base ` l ) = ( Base ` K ) ) |
| 8 | 7, 1 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( l = K -> ( Base ` l ) = B ) |
| 9 | 8 | #P_sqxpeqd | |- ( l = K -> ( ( Base ` l ) X. ( Base ` l ) ) = ( B X. B ) ) |
| 10 | 6, 9 | #P_eqeq12d | |- ( l = K -> ( dom ( join ` l ) = ( ( Base ` l ) X. ( Base ` l ) ) <-> dom .\/ = ( B X. B ) ) ) |
| 11 |  | #P_fveq2 | |- ( l = K -> ( meet ` l ) = ( meet ` K ) ) |
| 12 | 11, 3 | #P_syl6eqr | |- ( l = K -> ( meet ` l ) = ./\ ) |
| 13 | 12 | #P_dmeqd | |- ( l = K -> dom ( meet ` l ) = dom ./\ ) |
| 14 | 13, 9 | #P_eqeq12d | |- ( l = K -> ( dom ( meet ` l ) = ( ( Base ` l ) X. ( Base ` l ) ) <-> dom ./\ = ( B X. B ) ) ) |
| 15 | 10, 14 | #P_anbi12d | |- ( l = K -> ( ( dom ( join ` l ) = ( ( Base ` l ) X. ( Base ` l ) ) /\ dom ( meet ` l ) = ( ( Base ` l ) X. ( Base ` l ) ) ) <-> ( dom .\/ = ( B X. B ) /\ dom ./\ = ( B X. B ) ) ) ) |
| 16 |  | #P_df-lat | |- Lat = { l e. Poset | ( dom ( join ` l ) = ( ( Base ` l ) X. ( Base ` l ) ) /\ dom ( meet ` l ) = ( ( Base ` l ) X. ( Base ` l ) ) ) } |
| 17 | 15, 16 | #P_elrab2 | |- ( K e. Lat <-> ( K e. Poset /\ ( dom .\/ = ( B X. B ) /\ dom ./\ = ( B X. B ) ) ) ) |
